You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &lcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Lcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/041b/index.htm U+0041B].
  * `&lcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/043b/index.htm U+0043B].
